thoughts.text: I think it would be a good idea to start by listing the files in the current directory to get a better idea of what resources are available to me.
thoughts.reasoning: Listing files will help me understand what resources are available to me and will help me plan my next steps accordingly.
thoughts.plan: - List files in the current directory
thoughts.criticism: I need to make sure I am not overwhelmed by the amount of information that is returned when listing the files. I should only focus on the files that are relevant to my current goals.
thoughts.speak: I will list the files in the current directory to see what resources are available to me.
